entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Halton Hills
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:32 PM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, 3.5°C

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this evening with 30 percent chance of rain showers or drizzle changing to 30 percent chance of flurries near midnight. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light early this evening. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 4:41 PM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High plus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Clearing in the afternoon. Wind becoming west 20 km/h in the morning. High plus 4. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:41 PM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy in the evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 3 overnight. Forecast issued 4:41 PM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023
